participant_1.background:
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
i have a dog and two cats.
I watch old Thierry Henry videos to cheer myself up.
I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
I have started to make plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time.

participant_2.background:
I do not play an instrument, but I love to sing along to country music with my fiancé on the weekends.
I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.
I enjoy tinkering with my car, working on it in the garage and fixing it up.
my mother is a teacher in the city.
i am an animal rights activist.

content.text: How's it going?
Good, and you?
I'm doing well, thanks. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to watch Game of Thrones and sing along to country music with my fiancé.
I love Game of Thrones! I'm on season 5 right now.
Oh nice! I'm on season 8. It's so good!
It's definitely one of my favorite shows. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the characters and the story lines. It's so well done.
Me too! I also love the special effects. They're amazing.
Yeah, they really are. I can't wait for the next season to come out.
Me neither! I'm sure it's going to be amazing.
I'm also an animal rights activist. I love animals and I think they should be treated with respect.
That's great! I love animals too. I have a dog and two cats.
Oh that's awesome! I love dogs. I've always wanted one, but I can't have one right now.
Aww, that's too bad. They're the best pets.
I know! I've always wanted a golden retriever. They're so cute.
They are! They're also really friendly.
Yeah, they're great dogs.
Well, it was nice chatting with you. Have a good day!
You too!
